description:
We may learn PHP faster in real world project, this project will show you to design and code a training web site

In this project we use PHP and MySQL and standart prosedural coding system to build our site, we use twitter bootrap for our layouts, we use sb admin template for our admin panel system, we use netbeans as our free editor, and xampp as our server program

We start from scratch and step by step we build a trainig web site

This is the first course of our series, the project will be in 50 lessons part
title: Design and code a Training Web Site Using PHP MySQL
